article: president barack obama and house democratic leaders on saturday closed in on the votes needed to pass landmark health care legislation , with the outcome hinging on their efforts to placate a handful of lawmakers who wanted the bill to include tighter limits on insurance coverage for abortions .
abstract: democrats rally to obama s call for health vote
